job.title: Software Engineer, Integration Development - Austin, TX
job.description: LockerDome is an ad platform with a brain designed specifically for performancebased advertising The brain behind the platform is Neo an inhouse AI which uses machine learning to process billions of data points and make intelligent decisions at lightning speed Learn more at lockerdomecombrbrAs a Software Engineer Integration Development on the Engineering amp Product team you will work on advertiser and publisher integrations as well as related infrastructure and toolsbrbrThis position reports to our Austinbased Principal Engineer Candidates residing in or near Austin TX are preferredbrbrstronguYour Skills Should Includebrustrongulli Proficiency with of JavaScript and Nodejslili Proficiency with web development and the web development landscapelili Ability to learn new skills and information sets quicklylili Ability to solve unique or complex problems and provide actionable guidancelili Strong debugging skillslili High attention to detaillili Strong verbal and written communication skillslili At least 2 years of web development experiencebrliulstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Work closely with LockerDomes data and sales teams to provide support for clientfacing integration needslili Implement and maintain infrastructure related to advertiser and publisher integrationslili Implement and maintain tools that help teams at LockerDome analyze the potential and current status of publisher and advertiser integrationslili Expand upon and update documentation related to technologies we work with when integrating with advertisers and publishersbrliulstronguWork From AnywherebrbrustrongWe know worldclass talent lives all over the country so were proud to offer employees the flexibility to work remotely from anywhere in the US Whether its your living room an Airbnb or one of LockerDomes hubs in St Louis or Austin every employee can choose a work environment that best suits their lifestyle or mood
